description:
The Ten4Tec Mini Satellite Holder is a device that helps you keep your satellite device close and accessible when you need it most. It is a sleeve that attaches to your belt, shoulder strap, or door handle, and holds your device securely and comfortably.

  • It prevents your device from swinging around on a carabiner and makes it easy to reach and use
  • It’s suitable for emergency beacons or satellite devices that you may need in case of an accident or emergency
name: Ten4Tec Mini Satellite Holder
